member.name: M:eMicLibAdmin.BusinessRules.Catalogue.clsBCataScriptHelper.CreateOnChangeScriptForNonrepeatableFieldContent(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Bind input tag OnChange event handler with specify javascript code for non-repeatable field. This javascript codes actually update Hidden Field in form WCataModify.aspx ( Sentform iframe) and change value of leader. The format for separates between fieldcode value and it's indicator as follow : 10::data
member.param: FieldCode with sub field if exists
If this fieldcode is 245$a

member.name: M:eMicLibAdmin.BusinessRules.Catalogue.clsBCataScriptHelper.CreateOnChangeScriptForRepeatableFieldContent(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Bind input tag OnChange event handler with specify javascript code for repeatable field. This javascript codes actually update Hidden Field in form WCataModify.aspx ( Sentform iframe) and change value of leader. The format for separates between fieldcode value and it's indicator as follow : 10::data
member.param: FieldCode with sub field if exists
If this fieldcode is 245$a

member.param: 0 if not convert to UTF-8 else convert
